title: Create Media Buy Request
description: Request parameters for creating a media buy

adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version for this request

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for this media buy
Buyer's reference identifier for this package

products.description: Array of product IDs to include in this package

format_ids.description: Array of format IDs that will be used for this package - must be supported by all products

items.description: Format ID referencing a format from list_creative_formats

promoted_offering.description: Description of advertiser and what is being promoted

start_time.description: Campaign start date/time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Campaign end date/time in ISO 8601 format

reporting_webhook.description: Optional webhook configuration for automated reporting delivery using A2A-compatible PushNotificationConfig structure. Supports Bearer tokens (simple) or HMAC signatures (production-recommended).

url.description: Webhook endpoint URL for reporting notifications

schemes.description: Array of authentication schemes. Supported: ['Bearer'] for simple token auth, ['HMAC-SHA256'] for signature verification (recommended for production)

credentials.description: Credentials for authentication. For Bearer: token sent in Authorization header. For HMAC-SHA256: shared secret used to generate signature. Minimum 32 characters. Exchanged out-of-band during onboarding.

reporting_frequency.description: Frequency for automated reporting delivery. Must be supported by all products in the media buy.

requested_metrics.description: Optional list of metrics to include in webhook notifications. If omitted, all available metrics are included. Must be subset of product's available_metrics.
